income_messages:
From: d*********e@yahoo.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2022-07-27 21:36:05
SUBJECT:    Dr Mike Obale
   Dr Mike Obale
Remittance Office
Central Bank Of Nigeria
Abuja
26/07/2022
Sir
We shall use this medium once again to appeal to your person to urgently get back with me office to resolve the issue of your pending contract payment of usd17.397 million currently on hold at the santander bank, it is very clear and obvious that the payment had been confirm by you to be on hold at the back hence you had been able to confirm the online checking account, this payment issue is based on time hence the government had entrusted the bank to release the approved funds within two weeks, you should avail yourself of the opportunity and receive the payment.
Thanks
Dr. Mike Obale   
From: d*********e@yahoo.com
To: sb41315@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-28 11:59:09
SUBJECT: Re:    Dr Mike Obale
Dr Mike Obale
Remittance Office
Central Bank Of Nigeria
Abuja
28/07/2022
                                     RE:MEMO OF MEETING HELD WITH ALL FOREIGN OFFICES
Sir
To renew confidence and trust in our system and mode of operations, our office held a re-conciliatory meeting with all heads of embassy and high commissions in Nigeria on our best to settle contractors from there various counties who had not receive payments funds from the federal government, in the list that was published your name was specifically mention as a benefactor of the approved sum of usd17.397 million contract amount due favorably to your company, the agreement stated that to avoid delays and stoppages that five drafts from the bank be issued in your name, it states that the drafts shall be considered irrevocable and valid for payment at any bank, the dispatch process from the agreement is that you should either proceed to your home office to pick up the drafts or that you accept to receive delivery by courier, you are now then requested to name your choice of preference and accept as well to cover the insurance and dispatch fees of usd700 you could be better understanding call your foreign affairs office here in Nigeria to verify from the commission the out come of this meetings and the agreement reached by all parties, i advice that you use the window to avail yourself of the opportunity to receive your approved funds, in case you wish to receive the approval documents then my office shall give you the instruction on how to proceed.
Thanks
Dr. Mike Obale
From: d*********e@yahoo.com
To: sb41315@m**************p
Time: 2022-08-19 11:44:11
SUBJECT: Re:    Dr Mike Obale
Dr Mike Obale
Remittance Office
Central Bank Of Nigeria
Abuja
19/08/2022
Sir,
For two weeks now this office went on a short vacation to re access all the stands of the listed contractors who where considered and shortlisted for the principal payment of usd17.397 million, it is on our records that a lot had been achieved within February of 2022 and date many contractors listened to our advice and proceed to receive there approved amount, but your case is still pending for lack of compliance on your part and the issued for very bad past experiences, we advice once more through this report that you cancel all fears and distractions and focus on the main issue of receiving this approved amount through satisfied drafts which my office shall issue in your name and forwarded to your home office in your country, delay in this issue is not necessary hence your embassy here in Nigeria and your home office are full aware of the payment arrangement the the benefits thereafter, you shall reply and arrange on how to pay for the draft and the release of this approved payment shall follow without delay, i wait your answer.
Thanks
Dr mike obale

SUBJECT: Re:    Dr Mike Obale

Best,
Dennis
